titleStmt.title: [Queen Eleanor's confession] shewing how King Henry, with the Earl Martial, in fryars habits, came to her instead of two fryars from France, which she sent for. To a pleasant new tune.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for C. Bates, at the White-hart, in West-Smithfield.,

notesStmt.note: Title, date and place of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "Queen Elenor was a sick Woman ..."
Imperfect: cropped at head with partial loss of title.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
